basics.name: Not Provided
basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Financial Accountant specializing in financial planning, reporting and analysis in both private and public sectors.Capable Accountant successful at managing multiple projects and consistently meeting deadlines under pressure. Extensive knowledge of accounting software and processes. Detail-oriented bookkeeping professional with 3+ years experience applying financial and managerial accounting practices.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Accountant in the Financial Services industry handling daily operations, development and improvement of accounting processes - budget preparation, balance sheet, accounts receivables and payable transactions, payments and credit control. Preparation of all financial and management reporting and budgeting. Ensure an accurate and timely monthly, quarterly and year end close. Monitoring of financial and treasury functions including funds management, cash flow planning and projection.
highlights: Formally recognized for excellence achieved in financial analysis, budgeting and forecasting.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assistant Finance Manager in the Manufacturing & General Trading industry. Responsibilities include managing subsidiaries month end closing process and consolidation, preparation, reviewing and timely submission of monthly, quarterly and annual Financial Reporting for subsidiary company.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Junior Executive in the General Trading Industry responsible for managing accounts (GL, AR, AP), financial statement, monthly sales analysis, management report, daily and monthly cash flow and payroll for management staff.

skills.name: Accounting
keywords: Advanced Microsoft Office - Excel, Word, Power Point
Accounting software - SAP Fico, SAP BPC, Hyperion, AS 400, Acc Pac, iScala
AR / Credit System - CTOS, Polymath, SAP Copa
